# Maciej Garncarski

> Fullstack developer specializing in creating modern and efficient web applications. Experienced in both frontend and backend technologies, delivering comprehensive solutions for clients.

## Experience

- **Fullstack Developer** (October 2023 - December 2024): Developed an admin panel for the largest Minecraft server in Poland using technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, Fastify, Prisma, MySQL, and WebSocket. Implemented role-based authentication and authorization, as well as real-time user status monitoring via WebSocket.

## Technologies

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- React
- TypeScript
- TailwindCSS
- Next.js
- TanStack
- Astro
- Node.js
- Linux

- [GitHub Repositories](https://github.com/maciejgarncarski): Collection of personal and collaborative projects showcasing proficiency in various technologies.
